name: The Roar And The Whisper Album
description:
The debut Full Length from I Am Alpha And Omega

*Orders placed or that where placed will be on hold due to exciting news! Thank you so much for patents and most of all your support! See below Letter from IAAAO

Hey Everybody,

 We want to first thank each and every one of you that found it in your heart to pre-order our album. Words cannot express how humbling it is to have so many of you support us in such a huge way. We are so excited for you all to hear the new record and cannot wait to see you all at shows as we continue to tour.

 We have entered into negotiations with a label that will be announced shortly and will be arranging to release "The Roar And The Whisper" nationally with them. With this new development, the release date for the album is being pushed back to late summer. We do not have a specific date, but will share the good news with all of you as soon as we can.

 We would like to thank you all again for supporting us by pre-ordering the album. Due to the new release date, we have to delay the shipment of your pre-orders. All items, prizes and content will remain exactly as pictured. We will provide more in-depth details as soon as they become available.

 Additionally, we will be sending an email to each one of you who purchased a pre-order package. We will be asking for phone numbers, so we can individually call each of you to say thank you.

 Lastly, you all are our family. The Lord has used each and every one of you to grow and continue this ministry. It is important that you know that we have come to this decision after prayer and talks as a band, we have a tremendous peace about this new direction. 

If you have any questions, concerns, or comments, please contact us and let us know.

We love you all.

In Him,

IAAAO


Trust in the LORD with all your heart 
       and lean not on your own understanding;
In all your ways acknowledge him, 
       and he will make your paths straight.
  
 Proverbs 3:5-6
